definitions.definition: A hardy perennial flowering plant , Valeriana officinalis , with heads of sweetly scented pink or white flowers .
More generally, any plant of the genus Valeriana .
The root of Valeriana officinalis , used in herbal medicine.
An extract of the dried roots of the Valeriana officinalis used in herbal medicine as a sedative.

main_definition: A hardy perennial flowering plant , Valeriana officinalis , with heads of sweetly scented pink or white flowers .
secondary_definitions: More generally, any plant of the genus Valeriana .
( uncountable ) The root of Valeriana officinalis , used in herbal medicine.
An extract of the dried roots of the Valeriana officinalis used in herbal medicine as a sedative.
